name: Léon J. M. Rothkrantz
content: Personal page of Léon Rothkrantz Zoeken Sluit zoek Léon Rothkrantz Research Interests ·         Multimodal communication, (including speech recognition, recognition of facial expressions, generation of facial expressions, lip-reading, linguistics) ·         Knowledge based systems (expert systems, neural networks, agent technology, brain computing) ·         Dynamic routing (shortest path algorithm, design of routing devices) ·         Simulation (including serious gaming) Professional activities Scientific Committee 	 Euromeadia GAME-ON CGAMES TEXT SPEECH & DIALOGUES (TSD) Leon Rothkrantz (2022), Automated Access Control via License Plate Recognition using Neocognitron Neural Network, In Proceedings of the 2022 International Conference on Information Technologies (InfoTech) p.1-8, IEEE . Ondrej Pribyl, Miroslav Svitek, Leon Rothkrantz (2022), Intelligent Mobility in Smart Cities, Applied Sciences (Switzerland) Volume 12.
